website_summaries.verdict: An easily portable on-camera light that offers a good amount of lighting power.
pros: Brightness can be adjusted down to 10% and the light comes with 4 color filters, rechargeable battery, and a micro-USB charging cable
Can also be powered with a DC power cable
Doesn't heat up too much with prolonged use
cons: Doesn't come with a DC power cable and some had battery issues over time

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing light at a bargain price. The light is perfect for videos as well as photography. It's slim and portable, which I love, and it's very responsive when the buttons are pressed (see my video for an example). It was one of the only lights at this price range on Amazon that actually came with a battery included. I really didn't want to have to purchase a battery on top of the light itself, so this worked out great. Overall, I'm very impressed with this and I've already made good use out of it for YouTube videos.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!! See Attached Video!!
customer_reviews.text: In the right situations I have used this as a fill light.. bright output and good with my GH5 with has a crop sensor and poor low light performance.. and the blue plastic gel is amazing and very Vibrant!!! I shot a music video using the blue only from this light.. check the silhouette scene and the scene with the dog I had the light under the dog illuminating his chest as well as the artist!! GOOD FREAKIN LIGHT!!! I will be buying a second one again in the future!! the other color gels aren't that vibrant for some reason..
customer_reviews.author: Jermel

customer_reviews.title: Great for youtube videos also!
customer_reviews.text: Should you buy: Yes Material Quality: High Ease of Use: Easy Value for money: Average What I like is that the attachment fits all of my wife camera and tripod holders. It is a great tool for my wife to use in her youtube videos to make her portrait brighter. The knob on the back is easy to change the brightness from 0-100, She did not try the other color filter as she just need white. The battery feels very well made and I am not afraid of it failing on me. Overall, it is a great purchase for people who needs extra lighting when doing videos at home for their DIY videos.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Vo

customer_reviews.title: Beat my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Basically this beats my expectations for its price. It mounts on my hot shoe very easily, it can also be mounted on any tripod. Two colors suites different shooting scenarios. I also found I don’t need an extra diffuser to smooth out the light - it comes along with a semi-opaque plastic (diffuser) on the light itself, which is pretty awesome. Pretty bright at the max lvl, and actuallly it’s also bright at the min lvl too. Cons: The dials are a little bit confusing, esp when switching between color modes. It comes with only one battery, when you are outdoor and runs out of battery, you can’t use the light.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY/CHARGING
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device, and it worked extremely well at first, but after a while I would try to charge the battery and it wouldn’t charge. I thought maybe it could be the cord or it wasn’t connected correctly, but after switching things around I found the charger itself wasn’t working. The light that indicates that it’s charging (yellow or green) was not lit at all. It’s been about a month since I’ve used it, the concept of the product was amazing, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built light for better looking outdoor -- and indoor -- video
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight on-camera light, really nicely built. Super useful. Very impressive. Also smart the battery is removable so you can keep using it all day long.
customer_reviews.author: JRP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I initially got these to travel with when freelancing and working with clients with poorly lit rooms and it served its purpose very well! I recently decided to use this instead of the bulky soft box lights and they work so much better! I will be purchasing another one!
customer_reviews.author: Lisset Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I had low expectations for this camera light but it was actually good additional lighting. They are much brighter than I thought and worked well to fill up lighting my subjects. I have other continuous lightning and this is on par with them. I mounted this on top of my 5D Mark IV and it’s a match made in heaven. Also, this is ultra portable, thin and light. I will be carrying this around especially for night time shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: I needed something to eliminate shadows on my face during video meetings and visits with friends
customer_reviews.text: The solution was to switch off the overhead lights and use table lamps, etc. to illuminate the background. I mounted the ESSDI-160 on a shelf above my computer, and pointed toward the wall. The diffuse, reflected light with the orange filter installed got rid of the shadows. The continuously adjustable dimmer built into the light is an essential feature to get the right amount of light on my face to produce natural skin tones in the video image. Note: to install this light on a shelf (as opposed to a video camera for which an adapter is provided) you will need a small desk-top tripod or some kind of clamp mount that you'll find in camera accessories.
customer_reviews.author: jkp

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, portable and comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected. Comes with a battery as well as charger. The charger work with your USB charger so that makes it easy to carry. One less cable to bring with you. I attached a quick unboxing video. Compared to a Luxli Viola light, the ESDDI lights output is quite good however slightly on the colder side. But with the adjustable color temp and brightness you can fix that easily.
customer_reviews.author: patdohere

customer_reviews.title: Awesome High Powered LED Light for my video and digital cameras!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Led light mainly for my digital camera to use to shoot indoors where the lighting is normally low. This led light has made all the difference. I am not a professional photographer but I do take a lot of photos of my kids who are always on the move. I was so impressed with this light that I found myself using it with my Canon video camera. This light comes with 4 color filters for creating mood lighting, 7.4V 2200mAh 16.3Wh Li-ion Battery, Battery Chargers & USB cord, universal light attachment and ESDDI Led Photo/Video Light. I give this Led light my highest recommendation for anyone looking for a quality Led light at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: james Litterio

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for a video camera!
customer_reviews.text: I found the product quality is really good. It is suitable for a video camera, where you need continuous light source, with different light levels so that we can adjust as per our needs. But I would say its not for a DSLR, I mean sure you can use it there too, but I prefer a traditional flash for it. I bought it for my video camera, and I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Siddharth

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this light is perfect! Except the battery.. 4 hours to charge a battery that lasts only 40 min. What makes it worse, this product doesn't come with a plug for DC power. Got this light to run Zoom meetings. Didn't expect this light to turn off so quickly.. So just ordered the DC plug today but that doesn't resolve how I won't have a working light for today's meeting on Zoom... Considering how weak this battery is, would have been nice for this light to come with a plug. Lost 2 stars as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Rush

customer_reviews.title: Light is great - the rest is crap..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect LED for my iPhone rig BUT The battery only recharged once and is now not able to take more than a 25% charge. The charger is crap as well.. the battery doesnt lock into the charger base and the power light on it is always green - impossible to know what the status of the charge is or if the battery is even connected. I had to go out an buy a new charger and 2 BIG OL batteries at Samy Camera in LA - love them. $50 bucks and totally worth the peace of mind. One star off for the inconvenience of it all.
customer_reviews.author: jeff carter

customer_reviews.title: Weigh the pros and cons before buying
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Bright light, multiple color gels and rechargeable battery. Cons: The battery charger indicator light doesn't let you know when the battery is done charging and LED light only takes rechargeable batteries so if you're in a situation where you can't charge it you're out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light with many color filters to set the mood.
customer_reviews.text: This device will light up your poorly lit room. The led bulbs go from a 10, which is comparable to a low battery LED flashlight (still pretty bright. I would recommend using some sort of diffuser and/or a reflector) to 100 which is comparable to a truck's halogen bulbs plus their high beams. Very bright. The included battery charging cradle uses a micro usb-b input, meaning I can use my battery bank to charge the battery which is a nice touch. My only wish to make this device better was if the device supported the use of either USB-C or micro usb-b on the light body so i can use the external battery to power the device directly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great light! Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second led light for my FB and YouTube channel. I love this light! 😁 The company does a great job from the packaging to the product. I was pleasantly surprised with the lighting ability. Don’t underestimate the brightness of this product! I also love the filters and the ease of using this light. If you want a professional, power-packing light this is the one to choose! Great job on this product ESDDI! You totally changed the appearance of my videos for $35! The battery life is great and I have no complaints! They do it right!
customer_reviews.author: Joel McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great light for closer shot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great LED light for closer shots. I use this light to add lighting to my tutorial videos, even with only one light, I was still able to achieve well-lit videos. You might need two of these if you are shooting at a wider angle. The benefit of this light is that you can adjust the temperature and intensity. I also recommend buying an additional battery or a power adopter if you want to shoot continuously for more than 45 min or so.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Good light but battery charger is cheap
customer_reviews.text: The light itself is great! Very bright and easy to control. Battery was decently long but I still think you’ll need a second one. The charger that came with this decided to break when I was about to charge my battery during a shoot. The mini-USB port on the charger broke off and fell inside the charger. Now I can’t use this and have to go buy another battery with a better quality charger.
customer_reviews.author: TTang

customer_reviews.title: Very nice LED flash lights for photos and videos
customer_reviews.text: Amazing brightness and can be adjusted too. Great thing is that it works for photos and videos both and can also be used as stand alone. Comes with 4 color filters i.e. blue, pink, yellow/orange and white. This is a great product for the price being offered. Comes with its own battery and battery charger with charging cable. I wish this would have come with a USB travel charger too that would have helped a lot. Most of the products come with cable only and no USB travel charger making it difficult to use. For this price, this is a great product with awesome quality and worth recommending to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mah

customer_reviews.title: Nifty light that totally serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light a while back, & didn't have the chance to unbox it till last week. Battery charged great. Installation was a breeze -didn't need the instructions, since I'm used to mounting items on my DSLR camera-. Brightness is very efficient; & using the different color screens was easy. So far, I like this product so much that I'm thinking of getting a second -as a backup-. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hassan

customer_reviews.title: A great tool and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a dimmable light for my camera. This model excells in many ways. The filters allow me to correct any lighting issues, and the diffuser gives me flexibility for ECU product shots like jewelry. A rechargeable battery is a plus. I have used it with a tripod, handheld, and the hot shoe. It is a little heavy for my tabletop tripod but that's ok. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JulieCad

customer_reviews.title: It give a good amount of light
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for close action picture and video capture, it has enough light for a smaller room or making a youtube video. The battery came charged, I've used it a few times so far and it still has a good charge, not sure yet on longer usage or charging but I like it and recommend it for similar usage. I've only used the white lens for anything I've recorded and I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: sgrams

customer_reviews.title: The perfect portable fill light.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this LED light for two commercial photo (not video) shoots. On both occasions I've used it as a fill light (with the warm gold filter) along with a strobe and softbox as the key light. The wide range of intensity adjustment allowed me to soften the facial lines of the subjects, while warming up the skin tones. In addition, the battery it uses (an NP-550) is long lasting and cheap. I bought 2 extra batteries and dual charger on Amazon for around $32.00.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Led Lights
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed. Plenty of light at a reasonable price. There are four color filters that help make the lights more versatile and you could add any colored plastic that you want. While many inexpensive items leave me wishing for more these have met my every need. I purchased two and mount them on a couple of cheap stands. The brightness can be dialed in anywhere between 1 - 99 I mostly use them at about 60.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within weeks
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first and used for one day. Put away and took out a couple of months later to use again and wouldn't work. I left the battery charging for HOURS and it wouldn't even lite the led 'screen'. Waste of money. Probably will go in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: calc chick

customer_reviews.title: Limited usefulness
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is ready to use and pray. I love the battery charger being included in accord. It needs a clip so that I can stand it up. Org a stand would be nice it came with a card saying that I won a free prize. But when I tried to claim that prize I cannot get any customer service. So the light is okay but I'll have to figure out how to use it successfully
customer_reviews.author: a newell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Lights an entire room
customer_reviews.text: Mora than pleased! The light is capable of lightning up an entire room with no problem, very good battery duration and very good temperature control. Positive: - Brightness, its is incredibly bright! Once it is by 80% you can no longer stare at it, its too brigh! - Temperature control, It has a very good Cold-Warm color temperature adjustment, can easily match your camera settings. - Battery, pretty durable; a second pair is not a bad idea tough. - Built Quality, it is made of aluminium, making it a very sturdy light! Negative: - Not found yet. Fully Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Practical, and does a good job with light
customer_reviews.text: This light is a good addition to my film gear. I see there is the alternative to use external power source and I'm looking to get one, since that is the only downside I see, battery life. The charge is good enough, but this model only has 1 battery and you will really need more. The brightness is also good, and you have a dimmer. The shoe is plastic so you need to be careful with that.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Compact, Flexible
customer_reviews.text: very compact and commendable build. components fit flush among each other. relatively lightweight with anodized aluminum casing and built-in diffuser. PRO + comes with battery+charger + tilt-adjustable adaptor + brightness and kelvin adjustable + LCD display to indicate battery and functions CON - cold shoe adapter made of plastic (still ok and reliable, more of preference) - no swivel on the cold shoe adapter - small mAh battery would recommend if you're looking for a compact LED panel that you can bring along when you do your shoot/sessions.
customer_reviews.author: EiZ

customer_reviews.title: Review of ESDDI LED Video Light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ESDDI LED Video light for macro photography as there are NO available macro ring flash for my Pentax K-1 Mark II DSLR and it does not disappoint. The attached image uses only 50% LED brightness and I was able to take a test close up shot where there is a bit of darkness in the room and the exposure came out fine.
customer_reviews.author: E6Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Hidden Gem
customer_reviews.text: The ESSDI LED video light is my new favorite accessory to play with. I’m an aspiring photographer always looking for new ways to make my photos interesting. This little devices packs a big punch for an affordable price. I would say two of these could light up a whole shoot just fine. It’s a strong PLASTIC build. But that’s what you put for, the light is the most important part and boy does it deliver. The customer service is always something to note. Excellent customer service they responded me to give me aid with a problem I had with the battery in 24 hours. Getting another one!

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the Juice?
customer_reviews.text: There was no power source included in the package as advertised. No battery. No charger. I wanted to contact the seller first, but apparently there’s no way to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Great LED light for the hobbyist
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light after praise from a YouTuber that said it was terrific for the money. The light is as good as advertised in the product video. The range from low to high is very useful, along with the filters. It is also easy to find a low cost power adapter if the light would be used for longer than an hour or two.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Newingham

customer_reviews.title: A great light, great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with both my iPhone 11 Pro and Shure mic and Panasonic mirrorless camera for shooting video for the Skillshare classes I teach. It's been a great light, easy to use, great brightness and multiple color settings. I'm still waiting to see if the battery life is good, the first few shoots were pretty good but the third shoot it seemed to last less. I think ordering a second battery will be a good idea. For the price this is a great light.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sad that I missed the return date. As a photographer this is my busiest time so I didn’t have much time to play with new items. I’ve tried to use this now 3 times. I will charge it during the week to use for weekend shoots by the time the weekend gets here and I go pull it out it’s dead again without even turning it on! You really do get what you pay for, so disappointed I didn’t take it out of the box sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say i was skeptic buying this at this price point, but this was great as an additional light when i was in vacation in Jamaica. Sometimes using a flash the outcome is not very pleasing in some instances, but having a continuous light source helps so much. It is even better when you can control how much light you need. I definitely recommend this light if you are on a budget and looking for a great source of light. This saved me in Jamaica.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this light.
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviews have mentioned I was surprised by how bright this little light is. It is well made and the battery and colored gels stay in place and present no problems for me. I haven't used it enough to determine battery life but it seems it will be quite adequate for me anyway. I purchased two of these, one at the special price of $25 I think it was. My opinion is that it is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott  Wright

customer_reviews.title: Needs a DC battery adapter
customer_reviews.text: I missed the statement in the product description "DC adapter not included". When I opened the box, I realized that there "should have been" but was not a DC adapter included. Now my only option is to charge and use the light with the battery OR purchase a separate DC power adapter. I just dropped a note to the supplier asking for a link for a compatible DC adapter and hope to get a response. Otherwise, the light seems true to form and has worked well in my first few uses. Cannot comment yet on battery life, as it is too soon. Battery life will have a further impact on my need for a DC adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hanifin

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got my light for my small business to post pictures on my Facebook page. Battery charged quickly. Took a moment to figure out how to turn on, but turned right on and was quite bright! I was using a ring light previously, but the filters are a nice bonus! The light makes a difference for getting clear images and details on items. It has a mount to attach to a stand or higher end camera. Nice light that doesn’t take up much room and easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as an extra light for my video but it was bright and made it as my main light. The product looks solid and durable. As it says on the title it came with everything that was mentioned. Cool thing about this product is that its dimmable and you can see the digital number at the back of it as I have shown in the picture. This way if you take a break and you come back to resume, you know exactly how much was the brightness rather than trying to figure out through angle. Of course the colored filters were very neat and did its job. Over I got what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rocken B.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, don’t hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it came with more color gels, the orange and blue are the only filters that are strong enough color. But overall this light is amazing for the price and i get compliments on it all the time. Great for night photography, can be put on a stand on the camera itself or hand held if you wanted to, it’s got amazing battery life ive only charged it twice since buying it months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Defective battery
customer_reviews.text: The instructions said to allow the battery to die completely before charging. Mine arrived dead, so I charged it. It will turn in but immediately turns off. I obviously received a defective battery with my brand new light.
customer_reviews.author: Misty McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Solid build, good color, run-time w included L-series battery.
customer_reviews.text: Doing a pro-bono gig for a non-profit in Nepal, I contacted Esddi with my need for a portable, battery-powered bi-color light, and they were gracious enough to donate this one to a good cause. As you can see we put it to good use, and I was happy with it's performance. Clean color mixing, very bright for such a small light (only complaint is that the low end of dimming doesn't get that low). Easy interface and solidly-built slim profile. Lasts almost an hour at full power with the included L-series battery, and for several hours at 50%. USB-powered battery charger included.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Holman

customer_reviews.title: Portable dimmable led light
customer_reviews.text: I like this light because it has a small digital screen that displays brightness and it goes from warm to cool. The light has been used 4 times last week to get a bit more light in the shots. I’d highly recommend this light to add to your bag. The kit includes battery, charger, micro usb, a diffuser and 3 color gels. The light also has cooling ports and a dc port for direct charging.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget hunter

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSIVE LITTLE THING!
customer_reviews.text: This light is great! the package feels premium and the quality of the light looks great! The filters are also really good, I specially like the blue one. The USB charger is really practical now that we can find a USB outlet pretty much everywhere. The output is awesome, I'm using mine as a kicker light and so far to good. One thing, don't freak out when you turn on the light for the first time, you have to leave the button press for 1 second and it will be on, same for turning off. I will be updating this review to test the durability in a couple of months and also the customer service if anything happens.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Daniel Falck

customer_reviews.title: Had to send it back!
customer_reviews.text: It worked for two weeks and then it wouldn’t charge at all. I’m not sure if it was the charger or the battery, I sent it back and bought a better brighter light 8500k. I film outside and this light just wasn’t bright enough. Sorry just being honest. Steve A
customer_reviews.author: Steve A

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: Bought this light as a cheap add on and absolutely do NOT regret it. This little guy ROCKS! Battery goes pretty quick when at full power, but lasts a fair amount of time if used as a small kicker light at half(ish) power. The only thing I wish is that it came with a wall adapter for power. But you can find a suitable one of those for pretty cheap. Also the battery is a very common battery type so extras are easy to find too.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LED in budget
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light to use as photo fill for my food photography, and it seems to be perfect for this task. The light performed better than I expected. Just charge the battery until it is fully charged for couple of hours for the first charge. Initially, the light ran at 75% for 2 hour and then if got off. This was a good time for any constant light. Also it came with 5 different cards for different lighting and it is amazing to see different output out of that. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who are looking for a budget awesome light.
customer_reviews.author: Deep

customer_reviews.title: Portable and versatile lighting
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for just over a week now and I thought that I should leave a review! This camera light is extremely sturdy and it feels like it could take a beating, which is surprising because it’s so lightweight! The same goes for the included accessories like the included colored light filters, which are actually made of a pretty thick polycarbonate-like plastic. I like how they used a generic NP-F550 camera battery with an included charger, so I don’t have to waste my money on AA batteries to keep this thing going. I’d recommend this if you are looking into lighting up your shots better (isn’t that everyone?).
customer_reviews.author: Jason Chon

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile light
customer_reviews.text: I really love this light. It is lightweight and easy to use. And you can get different effects with the different filters. I have been using it to take macro photos of mushrooms in the early morning and it works great! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: wannarun4life

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working inside 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The unit heats up very quickly; however, it is bright and compact. It’s been less than 30 days and the battery stopped working. The unit won’t power up with the battery that was provided. I am returning it and ordering a second unit. I am hoping it was a one-off defect; I do like the brightness and size. (The battery doesn’t last long; I am hoping it is due to the defect and not an expected outcome.)
customer_reviews.author: J Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome led panel
customer_reviews.text: Awesome small led panel for video lighting. The color temperature adjustment is a great feature, lasts for quite some time with the included battery. I purchased some larger NP-F970 batteries for this and an external monitor, this light will last forever with the bigger battery. Heat management seems to work great, it gets warm but not hot to the touch after hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowkross

customer_reviews.title: Versatility is amazing on this light!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how bright it gets. The charge lasts for hours and it's easy to use. The color filters are ok.. the blue seems to work the best. I went to target and bought colored index dividers ( see pictures) and cut them to size to layer colors to make them darker or more vibrant (also gave me more colors to use). This light works very well.. puts out quite a bit of brightness and it's small enough to go everywhere. When I'm home I use it as a desk lamp and work light. I will be purchasing more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product I as advertised. I love the fact the brightness is adjustable and weight is just right! I would highly recommend this for those looking to improve the quality of their photo!
customer_reviews.author: MCabi

customer_reviews.title: Charger failed in less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: The light is great. The battery is excellent. The charger failed after the first couple of charging cycles. The control circuit appears to have stopped functioning. The voltage coming out at the battery connection is the same as the input voltage from the USB connection.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a month now. So far I really like it. It works great, and I like how it has the warmer color plate. It's extremely bright for the size. I haven't had any issues so far. All in all, I'd say this was a great purchase. It's definitely the same level of quality as the more expensive ones I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Hdfan

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it !!!
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for led light for a while now and when i saw the ESDDI 160 i t was just what i was looking for. its super bright and can be adjusted using the knob on the side, easy to assemble the filter and to mount it. totally worth the price. i needed 4 but only could of afford 2 but i will be buying two more very soon. these guys have good quality stuff value for your money and great customer relationship.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Enrico Pace Bostwick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very great light. I can think of so many uses for this other than just photography/videography. It’s super bright to the point where it’s unbearable to look directly at it on full brightness. Easy brightness control on the back. Easy battery swap on the back. Attachments are very versatile. Comes with great gel filters. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant Colors!
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to see this light mounted easily on top of my M50 Canon Camera, which made night filming very simple. I first tried the filters in a dark room and felt like I was in another world with the crisp colors they provided. I expected the blue filter to be my favorite, and it did not disappoint. The blue and red filters are the most distinguished, while the others are fairly similar. I was hoping the green filter would be really vibrant, to resemble night vision, but that was not the case. It's more of a faint green tint. Still, I definitely see all of them being useful in future projects. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Unbeleivable for the price
customer_reviews.text: The brightness and color temperature adjustments make this light perfect to light up the face without looking tacky. I have been able to adjust it to make it look natural in many situations. It's well made, very compact, and unbelievable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Pluta

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this light. Great flexibility with brightness controls and filters. Just what I wanted and exactly as described. I haven't used this a lot so far, but from I have observed, the battery life is at least good.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Far exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect. All the others I tried only have the option to have the sterile doctors office lighting. This thing is brighter than you can imagine and battery lasts just about an hour and 15mins on full blast, which you prob won't need to use it that bright. A bit on the heavy side, but this thing is a tank. If anyone knows of a smaller light that has the same color options please let me know!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rustlips

customer_reviews.title: Great Video Light with Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great video light for a reasonable price. I do a lot of photography and my husband does video. We both tried this out at home with our kiddos and it works great! It's very easy to set up, load batteries and use. I like the size as it makes it very portable. Often if I can't find good natural light for indoor photos/video I'll use lighting kits but they take time and can be complex to set up and take up a lot of space. So, this video light is great for a quick, portable option. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B

customer_reviews.title: good light; great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This light can run on battery or you can plug it in. The directions/specs for what kind of power pack should be used to plug it in simply say, "DC Power Input: DC6.5V-17V." Nothing is stated about amperage. So I contacted ESDDSI. Here's what they say: If the exterior power is 6.5-10V - then the amperage should be 2A (2000 milliamps or mA). If the exterior power pack is 11-17V, 1A or more.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't charge properly
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure whether the battery is bad or the charger is bad, but the battery life on this item is terrible. I can leave it charging overnight and the next day I get maybe 10 minutes worth of lighting before getting the low battery notification.
customer_reviews.author: Psiwolf

customer_reviews.title: Great battery great color
customer_reviews.text: This is my first youtube filming rig. The color control between cool and warm light is great. It can be a great fill light or spot. The adjustable nature makes it easy to control washout. Does not tilt however.
customer_reviews.author: Ryddle

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for video conferencing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a couple of these a while back, but just got around to using one. So far they work really well. I used it the other night during a Zoom video chat because I've been noticing how terrible bad lighting can make people look through a computer camera. Using one of these with a yellow filter as a front light while video conferencing looks so much nicer. I had it running continuously for over two hours at a lower light setting and didn't even need to swap in another battery. It definitely seems worth the price so far.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Creative, beautiful photos!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and take some really stunning photos. They are great for unique, creative projects with color that you can do in camera instead of post production. I have been using these for a few weeks now and everyone can’t believe how gorgeous the photos are. I’ve recommended them all to my fellow photographer friends!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Battery Charger Failed, Light Great
customer_reviews.text: The light is great, the battery good, the battery charger not so good. I had to purchase a different charger to re-charge the battery. ESDDI refunded me for the cost of the charger. If you get this light, might need order a charger right away, but other then that great little light panel for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DJL Hobbies

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Love the wireless operation, battery charge lasts a long time and it gets the job done. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because it has to be pretty close to be effective like about 18" or so. Any further than that and it looses effect. Maybe if it was brighter it could be set up a little further away? Anyway it works for all the zoom meetings that are now a part of life.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Battery works for 5 min then dies
customer_reviews.text: When it works it’s a great light, but this light dies within 5 minutes of using it. I’ve had it at 90 and it will die after 5 minutes or less, terrible battery on this. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great LED lights for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bang for your buck, beautifully packaged and comes with all the essentials you'd need. Not weather proof, but great in controlled environments. Still testing the battery life, although larger batteries are available for extended use. I'm popping these in my bag for an overseas trip and looking forward to seeing how these perform outside the studio :-)
customer_reviews.author: Bradford R.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is good. Bought this to improve image quality while recording ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is good. Bought this to improve image quality while recording live streaming and love how easy is to mount and manage this lamp. It's a bit heavy but compact so is my main option when I have to record video "on the go" because it easily fits my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Campos

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this led light! I and a DIY mom and I take a lot of photos shots at home of my kids and this light make the room look comfortable different plus the filters are a bonus 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: 13-17V POWER SUPPLY? Are you kidding me?
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to power this with a power supply because constantly charging the battery is obnoxious and it's life isn't that of a tortoise.... That being said, the DC input requires a 13-17 V power supply. This is ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS. I have 9 volts, 12 volts, 18 volts and even a random 20 something-er all around the house. I've never even SEEN a 13-17V power supply. I would give this product 5 stars if it werent for this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J.

customer_reviews.title: Makes photos look more professional.
customer_reviews.text: Light is user friendly, durable, easy to operate and simple to assemble. The battery is rechargeable and lasts for hours. Interchangeable plates provide different colored effects. Includes attachment for a tripod (not included). Worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Small Light
customer_reviews.text: Used this light for one night photoshoot. Worked great! Didn't cast ring light around my subjects, was easy to hold & maneuver. I didn't use it enough to check the battery life, but I would definitely recommend to other photographers that are getting started and don't want to spend a whole lot of $ on lighting.
customer_reviews.author: red1977

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product for its idea and amazing effect, although the product I received first has some problems with the charger. Then I tried to contact the seller via support@esddis.com. Surprisingly, I got a reply very soon and the seller is very kind and patient. Finally, they sent a new set to me. the new one works fine, the color of photos with the light is natural​ and bright, especially in the morning or after sunset. By the way, remember fully charge the battery for about 4 hours before you use. And after using, remember to remove the battery as soon as possible. good product
customer_reviews.author: shanrongxie

customer_reviews.title: Crapped out 2month use(Update)
customer_reviews.text: *New update(after receiving email from customer service they provided me with a new product, hop this one lasts longer. Happy with the great customer service and response time, earning my confidence in re purchasing from them again soon) Bought in April of 2018, used about 4 times and crapped out. Battery fully charged and even tried a different set but would not click on. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Onofre Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Bright, great color filters for hair- or fill-light or background accent
customer_reviews.text: So many uses for this light! I was concerned the housing was plastic, but it’s not a problem. Solid build quality, I can throw it in my bag and not worry it will get damaged. Plenty of light output, even with a color filter in place. The size is really handy. Now that I’ve used it a bit, I want three or four of these to use as on-location accent lights.
customer_reviews.author: JRP

customer_reviews.title: All around great light l, good use !!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it in several parties and live music venues. It is a fabulous l.e.d. The fact that i can film at 10 or go to 99 is awesome. I use the color gels for ambient effects. Battery life is awesome charge well the day before your event.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: The light works extremely well in fact. however the ...
customer_reviews.text: The light works extremely well in fact. however the charger broke (simply did not work) the second time i tried to charge the battery forcing me to buy my own charger. Making it about the same price as any of the few more expensive lights. If it came with a working charger / battery worked it'd be a 4/5
customer_reviews.author: Melody M. Stanhope

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: This is a useful camera light. I got it for my husband to used in his photography. He really liked the size and that the batteries are rechargeable . It's practical and works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The dim feature is super awesome for your cam. I have a Nikon D5300. I have other lights but I love this for video. When you need light and you don't want to bring all your lights and you were only going to use one light then this is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: cat9

customer_reviews.title: Average but fairly priced
customer_reviews.text: It comes with all the essentials, USB charge, Battery, multiple lenses and mounting kit, but it lacks the feel and beef of a good light. That all said, for the money, it'll get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light for you tube videos
customer_reviews.text: This light was used mainly for you tube videos and worked amazingly. The battery pack was great for outdoor use but you can plug it in and save the battery for later. It will also attach to your camera easily for photographic use as well. It comes with extra light filters but I only used the clear one. It is very easy to use and the light goes up to 99 percent but I used it at 70 percent which was bright enough for my use. I highly recommend this light for price value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and versatile
customer_reviews.text: These lights are just amazing. For the price, they can’t be beat. Amazing light output and so versatile. I use them as on camera lights for news interviews and even have several that are strong enough to mount on stands and use to light a sit down interview. You can use them with the color gels that come with them to light a background wall or for accents. So versatile for the price. Should be in every kit.
customer_reviews.author: Larry T.

customer_reviews.title: and it's a super bright, also come with digital color temperature adjustment ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this LED light for video shotting at night, it arrived with well packaging. the LED light itself look and feel solid and well build. and it's a super bright, also come with digital color temperature adjustment button, you can adjust from 3200 to 5600K, you also can adjust the bright level from 10-99, it's really helpful. it's very easy to use, i don't even read the menu, i already can figure it out how to use it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The Good, the ability to color shift to warmer lighting without filters. The bad, the battery life is not ideal but livable. The controls are not well documented so figuring out the settings can be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: RoboGriffeyTop Contributor: Harry Potter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light for the price
customer_reviews.text: This light presents excellent value for the money. It has a milk cover which gives off a nice soft light tone. The range of temperatures is very good and at its brightest setting, the light is quite bright. The flexible pivot is quite useful for adjusting where the light is directed at. The only minor complaint that I have is actually not toward the light itself, but rather the charger - it feels INCREDIBLY cheap. The light, itself, on the other hand, is very well built, but is a little on the heavy side. Highly recommended if you're looking for something affordable, but can still give you very nice looking results.
customer_reviews.author: karlpyka

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this light
customer_reviews.text: I got me a canon 6 d mark 2 and I need just a little extra light at times and this light worked great for it. I love that you can turn up up or down to what light that you need at the time and the battery runs for a good time. So i'm very happy with this, thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Penny Ott

customer_reviews.title: Great light, wonderful color and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and overall quality. The old batteries failed quickly, but the company designed a new better battery that works great! The colors this light produces is wonderful. It's perfect for beauty shots and video. I have shown this light to a few other photographers who have since both this item and love it too! Check out the actual image I shot using this light.
customer_reviews.author: SalWHanna

customer_reviews.title: Really Good!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, cannot be beaten. SUPER BRIGHT!!! With multiple filter options - none are overly amazing, but they definitely get the job done for quick on the spot videos. Can be a little harsh so may want to diffuse a little more or keep light further away from subject to not blind them. Bottom of light even has a hole for me to use my other light stand and works perfectly, also sat upon my 5D in flash hot-shoe no problem. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Hastick

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact LED - great brightness and color control
customer_reviews.text: I use in the studio photographing miniatures in landscapes. This light is versatile because of its small size. I can place on the table-top using a small stand and use for fill or accent light on small objects. I purchased a power supply to use instead of the battery because I use continuously. One drawback is the the light returns to default settings each time it is turned off so you must reset color and brightness adjusted settings when work is resumed.
customer_reviews.author: Elmphoto

customer_reviews.title: Good bright light, standard battery pack, useful power jack
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, very bright. I like the digital brightness level. (10-99) There is a standard Barrel jack on the back used to feed power to the unit (aux power). I modified my unit so it could feed power from the light to other devices. (short two of the 3 pins on the barrel jack on the board.) Saves me another battery device. -- Great little light and very bright, I use it for up-lighting video scenes.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!
customer_reviews.text: Love having this light kit in my camera bag. Extremely portable and the lighting is great. A must have if you're looking for something portable and light weight to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: PreferedSeller

customer_reviews.title: Great portable video light
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic mountable portable video light. Very bright, and nice to have included filters! Build quality seems good, and so far I've not had any issues with using it. My only suggestion is maybe include a second battery or have an internal battery so you can swap batteries mid use, but that may be above this price point.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cheon

customer_reviews.title: This thing did not work
customer_reviews.text: Brought this because of the reviews. Haven't had this for more than 3 weeks. Put brand new batteries in and it has not worked yet. Returning for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Battery & Charger do not work
customer_reviews.text: I charged the battery for the 4 recommended hours... it lasted about 15 minutes before dying. The description says it should last 2 hours. I charged it again for 4 hours.. lasted 15 minutes again... After that the battery charger does not even light up and the battery is completely dead. I called amazon who sent a message to the seller and told me they would respond within 2 days.. just hearing crickets.. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Justwantedalight
